section.name: Unit 1 Understanding and Defining DEI
section.summary:
This unit will provide definitions of the concepts connected to DEI. By the end of this section, you will be able to:

  • Evaluate and define what is meant by diversity, equity, and inclusion.
  • Describe steps to develop a shared understanding of these terms with students or staff.

After you complete the activities in this section, return to the main course page to begin Unit 2, “Awareness Building: Understanding Adult Learners.”
